snippet: Water scooter operators are reported to have sexually assaulted at least three Americans since July, the embassy said in a security alert, the latest in a series of advisories about crime.
abstract: United States Embassy warns travelers of increasingly brazen crimes sweeping the Bahamas, after water scooter operators on Paradise Island are reported to have sexually assaulted at least three American tourists.
lead_paragraph: Water scooter operators are reported to have sexually assaulted at least three Americans since July, the embassy said in a security alert, the latest in a series of advisories about crime.

headline.main: U.S. Embassy in Bahamas Issues Crime Warning
headline.print_headline: Bahamas: U.S. Embassy Issues a Warning About Crime
